mode.name: users_contact_methods
mode.query: SELECT CM.recid recid, CM.method_name method_name, CASE MT.method_type_name WHEN 'Email' THEN CM.email_address WHEN 'Pager' THEN CM.pager_email END method_target FROM rhn_contact_methods CM, rhn_method_types MT WHERE CM.method_type_id = MT.recid AND CM.contact_id = :user_id ORDER BY CM.method_name

mode.name: orgs_contact_method_tree
mode.query: SELECT WC.id contact_id, WC.login contact_login, CM.recid method_id, CM.method_name method_name, CASE MT.method_type_name WHEN 'Email' THEN CM.email_address WHEN 'Pager' THEN CM.pager_email END method_target FROM web_contact WC LEFT JOIN rhn_contact_methods CM ON WC.id = CM.contact_id LEFT JOIN rhn_method_types MT ON CM.method_type_id = MT.recid WHERE WC.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY WC.login, CM.method_name

mode.name: contact_groups
mode.query: SELECT CG.recid, CG.contact_group_name, CG.customer_id, CG.strategy_id, CG.ack_wait, CG.rotate_first, CG.last_update_user, CG.last_update_date, CG.notification_format_id FROM rhn_contact_methods CM, rhn_contact_group_members CGM, rhn_contact_groups CG WHERE CM.recid = CGM.member_contact_method_id AND CGM.contact_group_id = CG.recid AND CM.recid = :method_id
